00060 // This makes D3D objects work well in the debugger watch window, but slows down 
00061 // performance slightly.

00079 // strsafe.h deprecates old unsecure string functions.  If you 
00080 // really do not want to it to (not recommended), then uncomment the next line 
00081 #define STRSAFE_NO_DEPRECATE
00082 
00083 #ifndef STRSAFE_NO_DEPRECATE
00084 #pragma deprecated("strncpy")
00085 #pragma deprecated("wcsncpy")
00086 #pragma deprecated("_tcsncpy")
00087 #pragma deprecated("wcsncat")
00088 #pragma deprecated("strncat")
00089 #pragma deprecated("_tcsncat")
00090 #endif
00091

00093 #include <strsafe.h>

00111 #if defined(DEBUG) | defined(_DEBUG)
00112 #ifndef V
00113 #define V(x)           { hr = x; if( FAILED(hr) ) { DXUTTrace( __FILE__, (DWORD)__LINE__, hr, L#x, true ); } }
00114 #endif
00115 #ifndef V_RETURN
00116 #define V_RETURN(x)    { hr = x; if( FAILED(hr) ) { return DXUTTrace( __FILE__, (DWORD)__LINE__, hr, L#x, true ); } }
00117 #endif
00118 #else
00119 #ifndef V
00120 #define V(x)           { hr = x; }
00121 #endif
00122 #ifndef V_RETURN
00123 #define V_RETURN(x)    { hr = x; if( FAILED(hr) ) { return hr; } }
00124 #endif
00125 #endif
00126 
00127 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE
00128 #define SAFE_DELETE(p)       { if(p) { delete (p);     (p)=NULL; } }
00129 #endif    
00130 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
00131 #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(p) { if(p) { delete[] (p);   (p)=NULL; } }
00132 #endif    
00133 #ifndef SAFE_RELEASE
00134 #define SAFE_RELEASE(p)      { if(p) { (p)->Release(); (p)=NULL; } }
00135 #endif
